![](http://gadgedz.com/images/logo.png)

We at Gadgedz are determined to provide premium quality virtual private server hosting services for affordable prices.
We utilize enterprise grade hardware with Dual Intel Xeon's and ECC RAM to ensure performance and stability. We have multiple upstream providers on all our servers to ensure the best connectivity.

Plans:

OVZ768 - $3.50 per month

768MB RAM

1 CPU Core

20GB Disk Space

250GB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps

1 IPv4 Address

Located in Lenoir, North Carolina

Direct order link: [Order here](https://clients.gadgedz.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

KVM1024 - $6.00 per month

1024MB RAM

1024MB SWAP

2 vCPU cores

30GB Disk Space

1TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps

1 IPv4 Address

Located in Atlanta, Georgia

Direct order link: [Order here](https://clients.gadgedz.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)
